department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on June 26, 2024 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. \\\\nThis requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under TSPS SA Task Based, E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 2. This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development for the provision of the Task and Solutions Professional Services. Canada is seeking to establish up to two contracts, on an as and when requested basis, as defined in Annex "A", Statement of Work for, for a period of 2 years each, plus 3 one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract(s).
full_summary:
================

**Tender Title:** 08324-220071 TSPS – Project Management Support Services

**Reference Number:** WS4558410871-Doc4572573916

**Amendment Number:** 4

**Solicitation Number:** WS4558410871

**Publication Date:** May 6, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** June 26, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

**Amendment Date:** June 11, 2024

**Expected Contract Start Date:** October 1, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Category:** Services

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements:** The tender is open to suppliers who are registered under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:** Not specified

**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**

* Contact Name: Louis-Philippe Leclerc (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: louis-philippe.leclerc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not available
* Address: Not available
